title: Appleman 2XR Cranks GRX Spider and Direct Mount Chainrings
content:
Framebuilder Matt Appleman helped pioneer the recent shift in how we discuss crank length for different body sizes. The Appleman 2XR Cranks are manufactured and produced locally in Minneapolis, MN. The 2XR is Appleman’s unique and progressive vision of how componentry affects overall bike fit and rider comfort. New for this year are Appleman’s new Direct Mount Rings and expanded range of Crank Spiders provide nearly universal compatibility with modern drivetrains, including GRX.

Check out the new rings and spiders at Appleman Bicycles.

The post Appleman 2XR Cranks GRX Spider and Direct Mount Chainrings appeared first on The Radavist.
